Welcome to PySLAM!
==================================

```{eval-rst}
.. toctree::
   :maxdepth: 1
   :caption: Contents:
   :hidden:
```

PySLAM is a toy project I built that aims to implement a fully-featured SLAM library that
can have different SLAM systems built on top of it. Note that in general, I
prioritize ease-of-development and simplicity over performance, so don't use this
if performance is a key concern.
